<noinclude>{{structure info}}</noinclude>
Straight staircases are naturally generated components of [[strongholds]], up to 5 per stronghold can generate.

This room has the entrance at the top and the exit at the bottom; only the entrance to the room generates one of the doors at random, while the exit is always a plain 3×3 opening.

They are composed of [[stone bricks]] and [[cobblestone stairs]]
